entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
